UnitType.Description: Remains of those recently killed, called back to service by necromancers.
Remains of those long dead, called back to service by necromancers.
Remains of those long dead, called back to service by necromancers. They are tougher than skeletal reanimates, but not as fast.
The disembodied spirit of someone who was murdered in cold blood. Blinded by hatred and jealousy for those still living, and enslaved by the dark magic of necromancy.
High ranking members of a death cult who underwent a suicidal ritual to be reborn as a powerful undead spellcaster.
